short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab dictionary extension! Discover new words or look up definitions of words you already know.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing WiseWords : Navigate the world of words with ease and fun. Your daily dose of linguistics, simplified.

By clicking “Add to Chrome”, you accept and agree to install the WiseWords New tab extension and setting Chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in our Terms of use and Privacy policy

Privacy Policy: https://media-joy.co/privacy/index.html
Terms of Use: https://media-joy.co/terms/index.html

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall
